title: All Arc Raiders Quests - Full Mission List
description: Arc Raiders is an extraction shooter that takes place in a punishing world featuring robotic enemies that can destroy you for making one wrong move. When you add in the threat of other players who might want to kill you and take your loot, too, you really need to make sure you're prepared to fight at all times. But there's a bit more to the game than just survival, as there are also a variety of quests to complete that can provide you with resources that will help you on your journey through Speranza. Below, we've listed out every quest you can undertake in Arc Raiders.Arc Raiders missions listThere are currently 63 quests in Arc Raiders, though more will be added with future updates. As of right now, you can expect to spend dozens of hours completing these quests, which task you with finding spots on the map to interact with, looting unique resources to return safely to someone in Speranza, or defeating specific enemy types.Every quest is accepted by speaking to Traders in Speranza, and they'll need to be turned in after completion to receive any rewards. Additionally, some quests will be locked behind progression, so you'll need to keep pushing through your currently accepted tasks to continue unlocking new quests to tackle. If you're struggling to complete any of them, you may want to recruit a pal (or stranger) to watch your back. Here is every quest currently available in Arc Raiders roughly in the order you'll see them unlock, though the order can change a little bit based on which quests you're completing before or after others.Picking Up the PiecesClearer SkiesTrash Into TreasureOff the RadarA Bad FeelingThe Right ToolHatch RepairsSafe PassageDown to EarthThe TrifectaA Better UseWhat Goes AroundSparks FlyGreasing Her PalmsA First FootholdDormant BaronsMixed SignalsWhat We Left BehindDoctor's OrdersMedical MerchandiseA Reveal in RuinsBroken MonumentMarked for DeathStraight RecordA Lay of the LandMarket CorrectionKeeping the MemoryReduced to RubbleWith a TraceEyes on the PrizeEchoes of Victory RidgeIndustrial EspionageUnexpected InitiativeA Symbol of UnificationCeleste's JournalsBack on TopThe Major's FootlockerOut of the ShadowsEyes in the SkyOur Presence Up ThereCommunication HideoutAfter Rain ComesA Balanced HarvestUntended GardenThe Root of the MatterWater TroublesInto the FraySource of the ContaminationSwitching the SupplyA Warm Place to RestPrescriptions of the PastPower OutLost in TransmissionFlickering ThreatBees!EspressoLife of a PharmacistTribute to ToledoDigging Up DirtTurnaboutBuilding a LibraryA New Type of PlantArmored TransportsFor more on Arc Raiders, check out All Field Depot Locations and don't forget to use our Arc Raiders tips.
